name: 莊清松
objective:
—To introduce the fundamental architectures, characteristics and applications of modern wireless radio frequency and microwave systems from a system approach point of view.

—To introduce the fundamental characteristics of radio wave radiation and propagation.

—To introduce the analysis of mobile microwave wireless system performance based on system architecture, modulation techniques and radio propagation effect.

—To introduce the analysis and design of critical components at the radio-frequency front-end stage of wireless communication systems.
